body.name: aubor Mini Projector with Android TV 11.0, Support 1080P Smart Portable Projector with 5G WiFi and Bluetooth, 10000 Lumen，Auto Keystone Correction, Premium 360 Sound, 40"-130" Screen Video Projector
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 10 hrs 12 mins
features: 【Smart Projector with Android TV 11.0】This Android TV Projector with 8000+ apps gives you access to over 500,000+ movies and TV episodes. Watch favorite image from Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube, Disney+, HBO Max, and others. In addition, the mini projector has a compact design, which is almost a palm size,and the weight is only 1.1lb,will help you to carry it in anywhere.

【Support 4K/1080P HD Video Projector】 With the native resolution of 720P and support 1080P Full HD , adopts advanced LED and uniform illumination technology, which make the edges of the projection brighter and clearer. Stay seamlessly connected with the latest WiFi 6 technology,also compatible with 2.4G and 5G networks,and features bluetooth 5.2 function, easily connects the projector to headphones, speakers, and other audio equipment.

【180° Rotating Projection 】Our mini projector is free from bracket installation ,seamlessly rotates to project onto walls, ceilings, or even the floor. Gives you the flexibility to enjoy an immersive viewing experience on a large 40-130 inch screen

【Auto Keystone Correction& Premium 360 Sound】This smart projector uses automatic keystone and manual focus correction technology to give you the perfect picture; do the work in seconds. Otherwise you can hear the 360-degree audio that fills the room from this small but mighty smart theater

【Lower noise & Multi-device Connection 】With a noise level of <25dB, our premium heat dissipation system ensures a serene movie-watching environment, Immerse yourself fully and enjoy stunning visuals accompanied. This Smart Movie Projector with HDMI, USB and audio ports, it's compatible with laptops, TV sticks, USB disks, and more.Our commitment to quality is unmatched, offering free replacements and top-notch customer support. Don't hesitate to reach out if any issues arise with our

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Android TV built in, very portable
reviews.reviewText: Very portable and easy to set up. The stand is very versatile to a lot of different situations. Android TV came pre loaded with all the apps I needed for the different services I have and lets me mirror my screen easily. Was easy to focus and was very clear. Bright enough to see during daylight to some degree, good for background picture slides and ambience. Night time backyard parties is where this thing is at, incredible experience. 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work
reviews.reviewText: Total waste of time and money. Will not connect to any device nor stream from them. Also, pictures showed you could use multiple apps that do not function. Don’t buy this. It ruined my daughters birthday and I am returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Better than expected and easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great in a dark room
reviews.reviewText: Great little Android 11 projector with a few quirks.Remote - I almost returned it since it needs the remote to control it and I could not find a replacement remote on Amazon. Found remotes on AliExpress by searching for 'HK300 remote'.Picture is fantastic in a dark room but washed out when lights are on, see photos.Auto Keystone Correction is good but not perfect. I use a SAMHOUSING Ipad Tripod Stand, with 65 inch Height Adjustable iPad Stand Holder to place the projector on. It give me precise control for keystone correction and placement. See photos. It also holds my Amazon Fire 11" tablet for viewing videos on the patio.Sound is OK but not great . I added a EWA Travel Case Packed, A106 Pro Portable Bluetooth Speaker which gives very good sound. It and the projector fit on the stand. See photos.Android 11 has some quirks, the new Amazon Prime video app does not work but it has an older version pre installed. The older pre installed Amazon Video app is hard to control with the remote unless you switch between the direction keys and remote mouse functions. But it does work. I could not get Hulu or Disney+ to work, so I plugged in my Roku stick and it worked great. The pre installed Netflix app works well.The picture is great in a darkened room and it is very quiet. Paired with a Roku stick and Bluetooth speaker it is a great little projector for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Projection stops randomly
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to be used in my bedroom since I don't have or want a television. I've had it for about 2 days. The only problem I am having is thatthe projector goes black ever 15 to 20 min it seems. This is not specific to an app as it will do it even if I am on the home screen, only the picture will stop but the sound will remain. This is not my first time using this projector brand (the other is iPhone compatible). I really hope this is a fluke and will try a replacement. The other projector did not have this issue.Viewing and set up experience:Keep in mind this is being used in a bedroom. For my needs it really checks all the boxes especially with the built in apps (unlike the iPhone one) , if it will just stay on. The picture is crisp and easy to adjust, sound is good, and the size is perfect on a nightstand. It is about the size of a large microphone and easy to move up and down. The included cord is short which can be limiting. The set up is literally attaching power cord and go, USB cord is included if you want to attach in other ways as well. Apps pre installed are Netflix, YouTube, Google Play, Amazon Prime , and a few more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm watching the great British baking show on my ceiling my life is complete
reviews.reviewText: Best money I ever spent for the price paid you're getting so much. Audio quality could be a little better but honestly this could be triple the price and still be reasonable for what you're getting

reviews.reviewText: i like that its portable but i tried downloading diffent apps i cant and when using the remote its always moving slow for some reason ,also not that loud need to order soundbar or surroundsound

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 1st of all on the product image it shows that you can stream Disney+ but it not an option to download the app and stream it with this projector. Hulu can be streamed but rarely works. The image is always tilted and the words are blurry
